issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Implement DataFrame style API
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4595](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4595). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We currently can build a logical plan from SQL. We should be able to build the same logical plan from a DataFrame style API as well.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4595?focusedCommentId=16802415) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
Issue resolved by pull request 3671
